price: آيا له هغه ذاته بې غمه ياست چې په آسمان كې دى، چې په ځمكه مو ښخ كړي او يو دم هغه (ځمكه) سره خوځيږي.
arabic: ءَأَمِنتُم مَّن فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يَخۡسِفَ بِكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ فَإِذَا هِيَ تَمُورُ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: a-amintum man fī al-samāi an yakhsifa bikumu al-arḍa fa-idhā hiya tamūru
